revised_title: Investigation of Monoclinic Double Selenates of the Nickel Group
tldr: The author investigates the crystal structure and properties of monoclinic double selenates of the nickel group, including potassium, rubidium, cesium, and ammonium nickel selenates. The study reveals a regular progression of morphological and optical constants with the atomic weight of the alkali metal, demonstrating the isomorphism between the ammonium and rubidium salts.
